Starting This Blog

01 May 2015

The idea is use this blog to share some ideas and I hope to get some feedbacks. That blog was made using Jekyll and Pole with Hyde theme. Interested? Check the posts of Joshua and Bastiaan about it.

Just one quotation before start:

"Don't worry about what anybody else is going to doâ€¦ The best way to predict the future is to invent it. Really smart people with reasonable funding can do just about anything that doesn't violate too many of Newton's Laws!" - Alan Kay, 1971

I hope you guys enjoy the content.
